name: lokijs
description: A fork of LokiJS: Fast document oriented javascript in-memory database

scripts.test:incrementalidb: npm run build:only && mkdir -p spec/incrementalidb/dist/ && cp dist/incremental-indexeddb-adapter.js spec/incrementalidb/dist && cp -r dist/ spec/incrementalidb/dist && serve spec/incrementalidb
scripts.test:web: mkdir -p benchmark/benchmark_web/dist/ && cp dist/incremental-indexeddb-adapter.js benchmark/benchmark_web/dist/ && cp -r dist/ benchmark/benchmark_web/dist/ && serve benchmark/benchmark_web
scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.prebuild: npm run format && npm run typecheck
scripts.pour:beer: echo New npm version published, one beer for you !
scripts.benchmark:web: npm run build:only && mkdir -p benchmark/benchmark_web/dist/ && cp dist/incremental-indexeddb-adapter.js benchmark/benchmark_web/dist && cp -r dist/ benchmark/benchmark_web/dist && serve benchmark/benchmark_web

author: Christopher Fu <invent288cfu@gmail.com>
